mapper.select: SELECT AUTHORITY, ROLE_NAME, DESCRIPTION FROM T2_ROLES ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, AUTHORITY ASC

SELECT T2_ROLES.AUTHORITY AS AUTHORITY, T2_ROLES.ROLE_NAME AS ROLE_NAME, T2_ROLES.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, T2_SECURED_RESOURCES_ROLE.RESOURCE_ID AS T2_SECURED_RESOURCES_ROLE__RESOURCE_ID, T2_SECURED_RESOURCES_ROLE.AUTHORITY AS T2_SECURED_RESOURCES_ROLE__AUTHORITY FROM T2_ROLES T2_ROLES LEFT JOIN T2_SECURED_RESOURCES_ROLE T2_SECURED_RESOURCES_ROLE ON T2_ROLES.AUTHORITY = T2_SECURED_RESOURCES_ROLE.AUTHORITY ORDER BY T2_ROLES.CREATE_DATE DESC, T2_ROLES.AUTHORITY ASC
SELECT AUTHORITY, ROLE_NAME, DESCRIPTION FROM T2_ROLES WHERE AUTHORITY = #{authority}

SELECT T2_ROLES.AUTHORITY AS AUTHORITY, T2_ROLES.ROLE_NAME AS ROLE_NAME, T2_ROLES.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, T2_SECURED_RESOURCES_ROLE.RESOURCE_ID AS T2_SECURED_RESOURCES_ROLE__RESOURCE_ID, T2_SECURED_RESOURCES_ROLE.AUTHORITY AS T2_SECURED_RESOURCES_ROLE__AUTHORITY FROM T2_ROLES T2_ROLES LEFT JOIN T2_SECURED_RESOURCES_ROLE T2_SECURED_RESOURCES_ROLE ON T2_ROLES.AUTHORITY = T2_SECURED_RESOURCES_ROLE.AUTHORITY WHERE T2_ROLES.AUTHORITY = #{authority}
mapper.update: UPDATE T2_ROLES SET ROLE_NAME = #{roleName}, DESCRIPTION = #{description} WHERE AUTHORITY = #{authority}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T2_ROLES ( AUTHORITY, ROLE_NAME, DESCRIPTION ) VALUES ( #{authority}, #{roleName}, #{description} )
